mapper.select: select * from ( select 0 as is_dir, r.id, replace(concat(d.path,'/',r.name),'//','/') as path, r.size_byte, r.created_date, r.created_by, r.updated_date, r.updated_by, r.is_public, r.content_type ,r.thumb_file_house_id ,r.visits ,r.last_modified ,r.during ,r.video_length ,@rownum:=@rownum+1 as row_num from mos_dir d,mos_bucket b,mos_resource r,(SELECT @rownum := 0) t where d.bucket_id = b.id and d.id = r.dir_id and b.id = #{bucketId} and d.path = #{dirPath} order by r.id desc ) a where a.id = #{resourceId}
